name: soul-beacon
description: AI-driven resonance matching platform with Algorand ASA tokens

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:algokit && npm run install:all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:contracts
